title: How to plant under 3 minutes |Gardening wit Konzept Garden

subtasks: Identify the correct spacing for the plants
Bend down or kneel to reach the ground
Dig holes for the seeds or seedlings, using a tool or hands
Place seeds or seedlings into the holes
Cover the seeds with soil, pat down with hand
Mark or label the planted rows for later care
Check planting time and reconsider if under three minutes
